13 
14 FollowTrajectory::FollowTrajectory(ros::NodeHandle &nodehandle) :
15  nh_(nodehandle),
16  pnh_("~"),
17  start_following_(false),
18  r0_wait_for_first_sight_(true),
19  advance_mode_(false),
20  robot1_is_stationary_(false),
21  robot0_in_assit_mode_(false),
22  send_goal_now(false)
23 
24 {
25  robot1_odom_sub_ = nh_.subscribe("/robot_1/odom", 100, &FollowTrajectory::robot1PoseCB, this);
26  robot0_odom_sub_ = nh_.subscribe("/robot_0/odom", 100, &FollowTrajectory::robot0PoseCB, this);
27  robot0_basescan_ = nh_.subscribe("/robot_0/base_scan", 1, &FollowTrajectory::robot0ScanCB, this);
28 
29  goal_path_pub_ = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseArray>("/robot_0/path", 3, false);
30  marker_viz_pub_ = nh_.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>("/robot_0/following", 3, false);
31 
32  check_goal_client_ = nh_.serviceClient<a4_setup::RequestGoal>("face_goal");
33 
34  r1_prev_recorded_pose_.pose.pose.position.x = 1000; // to make conditions invalid at start (r1 is moving)
35  r1_prev_recorded_pose_.pose.pose.position.y = 1000;
36 
37  // Advance Mode
38  pnh_.getParam("advance", advance_mode_);
39 
40  if (advance_mode_)
41  {
42  ROS_INFO("Robot_0 Mode: Advance ");
43  }
44  else
45  {
46  ROS_INFO("Robot_0 Mode: Normal ");
47  }
48 }

53 
54 void
55 FollowTrajectory::robot0PoseCB(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr &msg)
56 {
57  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> r0_lck(robot0_odom_buff_.mtx);
58  robot0_odom_buff_.odom.pose.pose.position = msg->pose.pose.position;
59  robot0_odom_buff_.odom.pose.pose.orientation = msg->pose.pose.orientation;
60 }
61 
62 
63 void
64 FollowTrajectory::robot1PoseCB(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr &msg)
65 {
66  // Store R1 pose
67  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> r1_lck(robot1_odom_buff_.mtx);
68  robot1_odom_buff_.odom.pose.pose.position = msg->pose.pose.position;
69  robot1_odom_buff_.odom.pose.pose.orientation = msg->pose.pose.orientation;
70  r1_lck.unlock();
71 
72  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> r1_lck2(robot1_odom_buff_.mtx);
73  nav_msgs::Odometry robot1_curr_odom = robot1_odom_buff_.odom;
74  robot1_odom_shifted_pose_ = robot1_curr_odom;
75  r1_lck2.unlock();
76 
77  if (advance_mode_)
78  {
79  // Check if R1 is stationary
80  double pose_dist_diff_thres = 0.01;
81  double stationary_confirmed_time = 10.0;
82 
83  if (start_following_) // If in follow mode
84  {
85  if (nav_proc_->compute_dist_between_poses(r1_prev_recorded_pose_, robot1_curr_odom) > pose_dist_diff_thres)
86  {
87  robot0_in_assit_mode_ = false;
88  stationary_start_stamp_ = ros::Time::now();
89  robot1_is_stationary_ = false;
90  }
91  else
92  {
93  if ((ros::Time::now() - stationary_start_stamp_) > ros::Duration(stationary_confirmed_time))
94  {
95  ROS_INFO("Robot 1 is stationary for more than 10 seconds !");
96  robot1_is_stationary_ = true;
97  }
98  }
99  }
100  else
101  {
102  stationary_start_stamp_ = ros::Time::now();
103  }
104 
105  // Save curr pose for checking if R1 is in stationary later
106  r1_prev_recorded_pose_ = robot1_curr_odom;
107  }
108 
109  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped shift_pose;
110  shift_pose.pose.position.x = -0.5;
111 
112  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped robot1_shifted_pose = nav_proc_->transform_goal_frame(robot1_curr_odom, shift_pose); // Obtain the shifted pose that is 0.5m behind R1
113 
114  robot1_odom_shifted_pose_.pose.pose.position.x = robot1_shifted_pose.pose.position.x; // Store it as a R1 position shifted
115  robot1_odom_shifted_pose_.pose.pose.position.y = robot1_shifted_pose.pose.position.y;
116 }

119 void FollowTrajectory::robot0ScanCB(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr &msgLsr){ }

121 
122 // This function uses the service "face_goal" to check if two poses are in sight
123 bool
124 FollowTrajectory::goal_in_sight(nav_msgs::Odometry start_pose, nav_msgs::Odometry target_pose)
125 {
126  a4_setup::RequestGoal srv;
127 
128  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> start_search_poses, dst_search_poses;
129  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped in_pose;
130  in_pose.pose = start_pose.pose.pose;
131  start_search_poses.push_back(in_pose); // Include the start pose only
132 
133  dst_search_poses = computeSearchPoints(target_pose); // Obtains left and right shifted poses given the target pose
134 
135  for (int i = 0; i < int(start_search_poses.size()); i++)
136  {
137  for (int j = 0; j < int(dst_search_poses.size()); j++)
138  {
139  srv.request.pose_start.x = start_search_poses[i].pose.position.x; // Service call start pose
140  srv.request.pose_start.y = start_search_poses[i].pose.position.y;
141 
142  srv.request.pose.x = dst_search_poses[j].pose.position.x; // Service call target pose
143  srv.request.pose.y = dst_search_poses[j].pose.position.y;
144 
145  if ((srv.request.pose_start.x == 0) && (srv.request.pose_start.y == 0) && (srv.request.pose.x == 0) &&
146  (srv.request.pose.y == 0))
147  {
148  return false;
149  }
150 
151  if (check_goal_client_.call(srv)) // Check if service call is succesfull
152  {
153  if (srv.response.ack) // If response is true, then the poses are in sight
154  {
155  return true;
156  }
157  }
158  else
159  {
160  ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service");
161  return false;
162  }
163  }
164  }
165  return false;
166 }
167 
168 
169 // This function will generate searching points on eitherside of target with predefined offset
170 std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>
171 FollowTrajectory::computeSearchPoints(nav_msgs::Odometry input_pose)
172 {
173  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> search_poses;
174  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> shift_poses; // vec to hold shifted poses
175  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped shift_pose_temp; // Temporary shifted pose
176 
177  double offset_y_dist = 0.50;
178 
179  // Left side shift
180  shift_pose_temp.pose.position.x = 0.0;
181  shift_pose_temp.pose.position.y = offset_y_dist;
182  shift_poses.push_back(shift_pose_temp);
183 
184  // Right side shift
185  shift_pose_temp.pose.position.x = 0.0;
186  shift_pose_temp.pose.position.y = -offset_y_dist;
187  shift_poses.push_back(shift_pose_temp);
188 
189  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped in_pose;
190  in_pose.pose = input_pose.pose.pose;
191  search_poses.push_back(in_pose); // Input pose
192 
193  // Loop to insert shifted poses into search poses vec
194  for (int i = 0; i < int(shift_poses.size()); i++)
195  {
196  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped shifted_pose = nav_proc_->transform_goal_frame(input_pose, shift_poses[i]);
197  search_poses.push_back(shifted_pose);
198  }
199  return search_poses;
200 }
201 
202 
203 // Function to set a given target pose as a navigation target
204 void
205 FollowTrajectory::set_pose_as_goal(nav_msgs::Odometry target_pose)
206 {
207  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped new_goal;
208 
209  new_goal.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
210  new_goal.header.frame_id = "robot_0/base_link";
211  new_goal.pose.position = target_pose.pose.pose.position;
212  new_goal.pose.orientation = target_pose.pose.pose.orientation;
213 
214  received_goal_.push_back(new_goal);
215 
216  ROS_INFO("Sending new pose goal [%f , %f] ", new_goal.pose.position.x, new_goal.pose.position.y);
217  ROS_INFO("There are a total of %d target(s) to go.", int(received_goal_.size()));
218 }

221 // Function to add tracked R1 poses into goal list
222 void FollowTrajectory::append_goals_as_marker()
223 {
224  if (received_goal_.size() > 0)
225  {
226  for (int i = 0; i < int(received_goal_.size()); i++)
227  {
228  visualization_goal_.push_back(received_goal_[i]);
229  }
230  }
231 }
232 
233 
234 // Function to publish goal list as markers for visualization
235 void FollowTrajectory::pub_goals_as_marker()
236 {
237  // publish the pose in goal list as marker
238  if (visualization_goal_.size() > 0)
239  {
240  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray marker_array = produceMarkerArray(visualization_goal_);
241  marker_viz_pub_.publish(marker_array);
242  }
243 }

245 
246 // Function to publish goal to robot for navigation
247 void FollowTrajectory::pub_goals_as_path()
248 {
249  // Publish the pose in goal list as path
250  geometry_msgs::PoseArray pose_array = producePoseArray(visualization_goal_);
251  goal_path_pub_.publish(pose_array);
252 }

255 // To check the received_goal_ vector length
256 int FollowTrajectory::target_goal_length()
257 {
258  return int(received_goal_.size());
259 }

262 
263 // To determine whether R0 has reached the first pose in the goal_list "visualization_goal_".
264 bool FollowTrajectory::is_robot_at_goal()
265 {
266  if (visualization_goal_.size() == 0) // If there are no more goals remaining, return true to indicate R0 has reached the target
267  {
268  return true;
269  }
270 
271  double curr_goal_x = visualization_goal_[0].pose.position.x;
272  double curr_goal_y = visualization_goal_[0].pose.position.y;
273 
274  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lck(robot0_odom_buff_.mtx);
275  double curr_r0_x = robot0_odom_buff_.odom.pose.pose.position.x;
276  double curr_r0_y = robot0_odom_buff_.odom.pose.pose.position.y;
277  lck.unlock();
278  double robot_goal_dist = nav_proc_->compute_dist(curr_goal_x, curr_goal_y, curr_r0_x, curr_r0_y); // Compute dist between R0's current position and first pose in goal list
279 
280  double reach_goal_thres = 0.2; // Threshfold for dist computed
281 
282  if (robot_goal_dist < reach_goal_thres) // If R0 is within threshold then R0 has reached the first goal pose, then remove first element from list
283  {
284  ROS_INFO("Robot reached goal [%f, %f] ", curr_goal_x, curr_goal_y);
285  rm_1st_goal_in_list(); // Remove goal reached
286  ROS_INFO("Goal length %d ", int(visualization_goal_.size()));
287 
288  if (visualization_goal_.size() > 0) // If there are still goals remaining, print their x,y positions
289  {
290  for (int i = 0; i < int(visualization_goal_.size()); i++)
291  {
292  ROS_INFO("Goal %d [%f , %f] ", i, visualization_goal_[i].pose.position.x,
293  visualization_goal_[i].pose.position.y);
294  }
295  }
296  return true;
297  }
298  else
299  {
300  return false; // R0 has not reached the target pose
301  }
302 }
303 
304 
305 
306 // Function to remove first element (oldest goal) from the goal list
307 void FollowTrajectory::rm_1st_goal_in_list()
308 {
309  if (visualization_goal_.size() == 0)
310  {
311  ROS_INFO("No goal in list !");
312  }
313  else if (visualization_goal_.size() == 1)
314  {
315  visualization_goal_.pop_back(); // Removes last element
316  }
317  else
318  { // Visualization_goal_ size is greater than 1
319  std::reverse(visualization_goal_.begin(), visualization_goal_.end()); // Reverses the vector to utilise pop_back() feature
320  visualization_goal_.pop_back(); // Remove last element in vector
321  std::reverse(visualization_goal_.begin(), visualization_goal_.end()); // Reverses it again, so the elements are in the same order as before
322  }
323 }
324 
325 
326 // Function to send empty path to stop robot motion
327 void FollowTrajectory::pub_empty_goal_as_path()
328 {
329  received_goal_.clear(); // Publish empty goal to stop the robot
330  geometry_msgs::PoseArray pose_array;
331  pose_array.header.frame_id = "robot_0/base_link";
332  pose_array.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
333  goal_path_pub_.publish(pose_array);
334 }

336 
337 // Function to convert poses to pose array
338 geometry_msgs::PoseArray FollowTrajectory::producePoseArray(std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pose)
339 {
340  geometry_msgs::PoseArray pose_array;
341  int goal_length = pose.size();
342  pose_array.header.frame_id = "robot_0/base_link";
343  pose_array.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
344 
345  for (int i = 0; i < goal_length; i++)
346  {
347  geometry_msgs::Pose pose_temp;
348  pose_array.poses.push_back(pose[i].pose);
349  }
350  return pose_array;
351 }
352 
353 
354 // Function to convert poses to marker array
355 visualization_msgs::MarkerArray FollowTrajectory::produceMarkerArray(std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pose)
356 {
357  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray marker_array;
358  int goal_length = pose.size();
359  int marker_counter = 0;
360 
361  for (int i = 0; i < goal_length; i++)
362  {
363  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
364  marker.header.frame_id = "robot_0/odom";
365 
366  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
367 
368  marker.lifetime = ros::Duration(2.0);
369  marker.ns = "test";
370  marker.id = marker_counter++;
371 
372  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::ARROW;
373 
374  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
375 
376  // Set position and orientation
377  marker.pose.position.x = pose[i].pose.position.x;
378  marker.pose.position.y = pose[i].pose.position.y;
379  marker.pose.position.z = 0.0;
380 
381  marker.pose.orientation.x = pose[i].pose.orientation.x;
382  marker.pose.orientation.y = pose[i].pose.orientation.y;
383  marker.pose.orientation.z = pose[i].pose.orientation.z;
384  marker.pose.orientation.w = pose[i].pose.orientation.w;
385 
386  // Set the scale of the marker
387  marker.scale.x = 0.5;
388  marker.scale.y = 0.2;
389  marker.scale.z = 0.2;
390 
391  if (i == (goal_length - 1))
392  {
393  // The final pose's color is green
394  std_msgs::ColorRGBA green_color;
395  green_color.a = 0.5;
396  green_color.r = 0.0;
397  green_color.g = 1.0;
398  green_color.b = 0.0;
399  marker.color = green_color;
400  }
401  else
402  {
403  // The interim pose's color is blue
404  std_msgs::ColorRGBA blue_color;
405  blue_color.a = 0.5;
406  blue_color.r = 0.0;
407  blue_color.g = 0.0;
408  blue_color.b = 1.0;
409  marker.color = blue_color;
410  }
411 
412  marker_array.markers.push_back(marker);
413  }
414  return marker_array;
415 }

418 
419 // Main loop
420 
421 void FollowTrajectory::seperateThread()
422 {
423  ros::Rate rate_limiter(1.0);
424  while (ros::ok())
425  {
426  // [P/C] R0 will stay stationary until it first sees R1
427  if (r0_wait_for_first_sight_)
428  {
429  // Fetch R0 pose
430  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lck(robot0_odom_buff_.mtx);
431  nav_msgs::Odometry r0_odom = robot0_odom_buff_.odom;
432  lck.unlock();
433 
434  // Determine whether R1 is in sight of R0
435  if (goal_in_sight(r0_odom, robot1_odom_shifted_pose_))
436  {
437  ROS_INFO("First sight of Robot 1 ...");
438  r0_wait_for_first_sight_ = false; // No longer waiting
439  start_following_ = true; // Follow mode activated
440  prev_communicated_pose_ = robot1_odom_shifted_pose_;
441  set_pose_as_goal(robot1_odom_shifted_pose_); // Set R1 pose as a navigation goal
442  append_goals_as_marker(); // Append received_goal_ to markers array
443  pub_goals_as_marker(); // Publish to markers array for visualization
444  pub_goals_as_path(); // Send received_goal_ to navigate robot
445  received_goal_.clear(); // Clear current received goals
446  }
447  }
448  else
449  {
450  if (!advance_mode_) // If not in advance mode
451  {
452  // [P/C]: If R0 currently in follow mode - will track and save R1 poses into a vector [received_goal_]
453  if (start_following_)
454  {
455  // Threshold for setting new goals
456  double tracking_dist = 1.0; // meters
457 
458  // If R1 distance to previously communicated pose is greater than 1.0m
459  if (nav_proc_->compute_dist_between_poses(prev_communicated_pose_, robot1_odom_shifted_pose_) > tracking_dist)
460  {
461  set_pose_as_goal(robot1_odom_shifted_pose_); // Set R1's current position as a goal
462  prev_communicated_pose_ = robot1_odom_shifted_pose_; // Thereafter this pose becomes the previously communicated pose
463  }
464  // If R1 is not in sight of last goal && distance is greater than 1.0m; need to command R0 to start navigating
465  else if (!goal_in_sight(prev_communicated_pose_, robot1_odom_shifted_pose_) &&
466  nav_proc_->compute_dist_between_poses(prev_communicated_pose_, robot1_odom_shifted_pose_) > 1.0)
467  {
468  set_pose_as_goal(robot1_odom_shifted_pose_);
469  prev_communicated_pose_ = robot1_odom_shifted_pose_;
470  send_goal_now = true;
471  }
472 
473  // R0 to start navigating to the tracked poses
474  if (received_goal_.size() > 3 || send_goal_now)
475  {
476  send_goal_now = false;
477  append_goals_as_marker(); // Append received_goal_ to markers array
478  pub_goals_as_marker(); // Publish to markers array
479  pub_goals_as_path(); // Send received_goal_ to robot
480  received_goal_.clear(); // Clear away current received goals
481  }
482  }
483  }
484  else
485  {
486  // [D/HD]: Active follower / Advance mode
487 
488  double advance_tracking_dist = 0.2;
489 
490  // If R1 is not in sight - request R0 to start navigating
491  if ((!goal_in_sight(prev_communicated_pose_, robot1_odom_shifted_pose_) ||
492  nav_proc_->compute_dist_between_poses(prev_communicated_pose_, robot1_odom_shifted_pose_) > // If last pose goal and R1 are not in sight && also not in assist mode
493  advance_tracking_dist) && start_following_ && !robot0_in_assit_mode_)
494  {
495  pub_empty_goal_as_path(); // Send empty goal to stop current motion
496  prev_communicated_pose_ = robot1_odom_shifted_pose_; // Resend latest goal to follow
497  set_pose_as_goal(prev_communicated_pose_);
498  append_goals_as_marker(); // Append received_goal_ to markers array
499  pub_goals_as_marker(); // Publish to markers array
500  pub_goals_as_path(); // Send received_goal_ to robot
501  received_goal_.clear(); // Clear current received goals
502  visualization_goal_.clear();
503  }
504  // If R1 is stationary for > 10 seconds , R0 will go to the side of R1 (assistance mode)
505  if (robot1_is_stationary_ && (robot0_in_assit_mode_ == false))
506  {
507  ROS_INFO("Robot 1 has been stationary for > 10 seconds");
508  ROS_INFO("Robot 0 is going into assistance mode (move to the left side (0.5m away) from Robot 1 ");
509  robot1_is_stationary_ = false;
510  robot0_in_assit_mode_ = true;
511 
512  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> r1_lck(robot1_odom_buff_.mtx);
513  nav_msgs::Odometry robot1_stationary_odom = robot1_odom_buff_.odom;
514  r1_lck.unlock();
515 
516  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> computed_assit_mode_poses; // Container to hold poses taking R0 to assist mode
517  computed_assit_mode_poses = nav_proc_->computeAssitModePoses(robot1_stationary_odom); // Pass in target pose and assist mode shifting will be computed and returned
518 
519  nav_msgs::Odometry interim_pose1; // To hold the 2 poses returned leading to R0 being in assist mode
520  nav_msgs::Odometry interim_pose2;
521  interim_pose1.pose.pose = computed_assit_mode_poses[0].pose;
522  interim_pose2.pose.pose = computed_assit_mode_poses[1].pose;
523 
524  set_pose_as_goal(interim_pose1);
525  set_pose_as_goal(interim_pose2);
526 
527  append_goals_as_marker(); // Append received_goal_ to markers array
528  pub_goals_as_marker(); // Publish to markers array
529  pub_goals_as_path(); // Send received_goal_ to robot
530  received_goal_.clear(); // Clear current received goals
531  visualization_goal_.clear();
532  }
533  }
534  }
535 
536  if (!advance_mode_)
537  {
538  is_robot_at_goal(); // Check if R0 is near the first pose on the list
539  pub_goals_as_marker(); // Keep publishing the latest goal list for visualization
540  }
541  rate_limiter.sleep();
542  }
543 }
